Articles.Content:
I recently got a new computer and I am unable to start KSP through steam now.

Both KSP and the launcher run perfectly fine when launched from their .exe they just won't start through steam.

When I start the game through steam in the library it goes from starting to running before ending out without actually doing anything whatsoever.

I tried running KSP and its launcher as non-steam games to the same effect.

I am currently using WIndows 10 64-bit, I feel like it has something to do with that but I'm not sure how to fix it.

 

UPDATE: It seems forcing the game to choose a renderer through the startup params fixed it

Edited March 22, 2016 by rokoy
